rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Reception Area
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception desk, integrated storage and display area. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the eastern direction for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room that connects to both indoor and outdoor spaces. Scandinavian design elements include minimalistic furniture, natural light, and a neutral color palette.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan dining space adjoining the living room with large windows to let in ample natural light, designed for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Scandinavian design, including an island worktop. Designed for functionality with energy-efficient appliances and ample storage. Windows are placed to the south per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A dedicated space on the ground floor that includes a small bedroom and attached bath for domestic staff, ensuring privacy and functionality.

openings.description: Large door with glass sidelights to maximize natural light. Adheres to Vastu by facing the auspicious eastern direction.
Secondary entrance, facilitating easy access for service personnel and emergency exits.

openings.location: East facade of Living Room and Kitchen
openings.description: Large window openings that provide natural light and ventilation according to Vastu principles.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool Area
additional_features.description: An outdoor swimming pool with a deck area, designed in a minimalist Scandinavian style. Includes seating areas and landscaping in accordance with local aesthetics.
